p.3: A key role for the organization, this individual will be responsible for working with our Biomarker Discovery and IT teams on a daily basis.
p.5: To succeed in this role, the individual will need to understand the purpose of genomics in the drug development process and while not required to analyze results, the right candidate will be able to engage with scientists to understand the problem statement and develop workflows that support analysis of genomics data.
p.7: As DNAnexus is the primary commercial platform used by the team, the candidate ideally will have had experience working with this platform to support analyses. With the guidance of our scientists and IT, this individual will be responsible for developing workflows through software development / programming using python, WDL, and by leveraging platforms such as AWS and DNAnexus. As there are many open source and web-based tools available to support genomic analysis, this individual will work with IT and scientists to onboard these tools and automate the analysis processes needed by the team.

li: Work closely with Bioanalytical scientists to develop relevant workflows and data pipelines
li.1: Analyze, understand and translate business requirements
li.2: Develop workflows in support of genomics analysis on the DNAnexus platform
li.3: Coordinate with vendor, infrastructure, project and IT support team members
li.5: Excellent organizational, time management and follow through skills

li: 2+ years of knowledge leveraging the DNAnexus platform and products (e.g. dxToolkit)
li.1: 3+ years of experience in python programming
li.2: 3+ years of experience developing data pipelines for genomics
li.3: Ability to develop genomics workflows e.g. using Workflow Description Language (WDL)
li.4: Awareness of AWS cloud analytics & genomics
li.5: 2+ years of experience working across IT and business teams in a matrixed environment
li.6: 3+ years of knowledge and understanding of Biomarker, Bioanalytical and Genomics Research

li: 12 month contract with ability to extend
li.1: Remote to start - some travel in the future to Rockville, MD
